        type - the type of iHealth devices

    • Method Detail

      • connectDevice

        public void connectDevice(java.lang.String deviceTag,
                          long delay)
        Connect to the WiFi of BPM1
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get device's battery successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDeviceBPM1Callback.onNewDataNotify(String type, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_STATE_BPM1
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        Parameters:
        deviceTag - Equipment of WiFi
        delay - Connection timeout

      • getIDPS

        public void getIDPS()
        Access to equipment IDPS
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get device's battery successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDeviceBPM1Callback.onNewDataNotify(String type, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_IDPS_BPM1
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.

      • getRouters

        public void getRouters()
        To obtain a list of WiFi
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get device's battery successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDeviceBPM1Callback.onNewDataNotify(String type, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_ROUTERS_BPM1
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.

      • sendRouter

        public void sendRouter(org.json.JSONObject object)
        Send the WiFi information
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get device's battery successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDeviceBPM1Callback.onNewDataNotify(String type, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_STATE_BPM1
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        Parameters:
        object - Contains information about WiFi JasonObject

      • connectConfiguration

        public void connectConfiguration(java.lang.String wifiConfig)
        To connect to the WiFi configuration
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get device's battery successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDeviceBPM1Callback.onNewDataNotify(String type, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_STATE_BPM1
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
        Parameters:
        wifiConfig - The name of the WiFi to connect

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • If get device's battery successfully. following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDeviceBPM1Callback.onNewDataNotify(String type, String action, String message)
          • The action is BpProfile.ACTION_STATE_BPM1
          • The keys of the message will show in keyList of the action.
